Wolfblade:

She smiled and shook her head. "Oh sure. I understand. We all get 
that way sometimes. No hard feelings pal. Besides, I'm glad your on 
our side. We need a strong sparked fighter like you on our team. Glad 
to have you as a friend."  She smiled and shook his paw.


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "bustercross365" <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Malice found a computer terminal and began accessing it.  He pulled 
> up an inventory, and looked for the neccesary items for his plan.  
He 
> found there was a sufficent supplies.  He then checked the conduits 
> to see if he could use the interface. Satisfied, he found he had 
free 
> time, so he felt it would time to apologize to Wolfblade.
> "Hey Wolfblade?  I want to say I'm sorry for earlier.  I was 
hungrey 
> and iratible.  I had no reason to get in a huff.  Sorry."
> He extended his clawed hand, to shake and make up. 
> 
>
